item.title: How to use Microsoft graph toolkit react people picker control in SPFx Webpart?

item.title: Use single-tenant Azure AD apps with Microsoft Graph Toolkit
item.description: When using Microsoft Graph Toolkit with Azure AD single-tenant Azure AD apps, you need to adjust MSAL Provider initiation for your app to work.
